channel.title: ETL on Priyanka Yelluru
channel.description: Recent content in ETL on Priyanka Yelluru

item.title: Data Transformation Strategies for Clean and Consistent Data
item.description: Learn essential data transformation techniques for cleaning, normalizing, and harmonizing data in ETL pipelines.

item.title: Understanding Medallion Architecture
item.description: An in-depth look at Medallion Architecture, its layers (Bronze, Silver, Gold), principles, and real-world use cases in modern data engineering.

item.title: SQL Window Functions
item.description: A comprehensive guide to SQL Window Functions, their use cases, and real-world applications.
